reviewHighlights.text: Game is one that I really enjoy. The Long Island Railroad is my favorite simulation. It is very realistic. I rode this line as a child and as an adult...
Performance is atrocious even on high-end computers. With PCs getting super expensive, Dovetail needs to focus on optimization ASAP.
